fields.description:
Create a basic alloy app and add the below code to index.xml.

Issues seems to be OK when using Titanium SDK 6.1.2

<Alloy>
	<Window class="container">
		<View layout="vertical" backgroundColor="orange" height="Titanium.UI.SIZE" >
			<TableView width="90%"  height="Titanium.UI.SIZE" top="0" backgroundColor="olive" >
				<TableViewRow  height="Titanium.UI.SIZE" >
					<ImageView image="/images/apiHealth.png" class="iconRowTitle" />
					<Label text="API Health" class="textRowTitle" />
				</TableViewRow>
				<TableViewRow height="Titanium.UI.SIZE">
					<ImageView image="/images/consEng.png" class="iconRowTitle" />
					<Label text="Consumer Engagement" class="textRowTitle" />
				</TableViewRow>
				<TableViewRow height="Titanium.UI.SIZE">
					<ImageView image="/images/apiUsage.png" class="iconRowTitle" />
					<Label text="API Usage" class="textRowTitle" />
				</TableViewRow>
				<TableViewRow height="Titanium.UI.SIZE">
					<ImageView image="/images/apiInfra.png" class="iconRowTitle" />
					<Label text="Infrastructure Health" class="textRowTitle" />
				</TableViewRow>
			</TableView>
			<View width="90%" height="Titanium.UI.SIZE" top="20" backgroundColor="pink">
				<TableView width="100%" height="Titanium.UI.SIZE" class="noStyleTable"   backgroundColor="#f1f8f9" >
					<TableViewSection headerTitle="Current Activity Performance" class="H3"  >
						<TableViewRow class="horizontal" >
							<Label id="transComp" text="0"  class="data" />
							<Label text="Transactions Completed"  />
						</TableViewRow>
						<TableViewRow class="horizontal" >
							<Label id="avgResp" text="0"  class="data" />
							<Label text="Average Response Time"  />
						</TableViewRow>
						<TableViewRow class="horizontal" >
							<Label id="tps" text="0"  class="data" />
							<Label text="TPS" />
						</TableViewRow>
					</TableViewSection>
				</TableView>
			</View>
		</View>
	</Window>
</Alloy>
fields.summary: Titanium.UI.SIZE doesn't work for TableView on Android
fields.environment:
MacOS X, Sierra

Tested on Android Emulator, Android 6.0 & Android Emulator, Android 7.1.1 
Tested on Titanium SDK : 6.2.2 & 6.2.1
